content.prompt: The American Temperance Society used which of the following evidence in the excerpt to explain why it believed the temperance movement would be successful?

choices.label: Its supporters held the moral and religious high ground.
Its supporters were willing to use violence to get people to stop drinking alcohol.
Its supporters were more likely to vote in upcoming elections.
Its supporters used new transportation routes to spread their message.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
